metadata.title: CVE-2017-15022 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, does not validate the DW_AT_name datatype, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(bfd_hash_hash NULL pointer dereference, or out-of-bounds access, andapplication crash) via a crafted ELF file, related to scan_unit_for_symbolsand parse_comp_unit.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
